column3: Sir, my concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right.
Some of God's greatest gifts are unanswered prayers.
Not only does God play dice, but... he sometimes throws them where they cannot be seen.
God lends a helping hand to the man who tries hard.
Reason is God's crowning gift to man.
I found thee not, O Lord, without, because I erred in seeking thee without that wert within.
God is best known in not knowing him.
God has entrusted me with myself.
After all, God is God because he remembers.
In myself I am nothing. It all comes from God and the Virgin Mary.
I've said all along that God is in control.
Whatever comes from God is impossible for a man to turn back.
God is in the sadness and the laughter, in the bitter and the sweet.
To lovers of the truth, nothing can be put before God and hope in Him.
There is nothing unpremeditated, nothing neglected by God. His unsleeping eye beholds all things.
It may be that our role on this planet is not to worship God - but to create him.
God sent Jesus as an example to see if we could retain and maintain the Holy Spirit in human flesh.
Life is God's novel. Let him write it.
If you must be mad, be it not for the things of the world. Be mad with the love of God.
Many are the names of God and infinite the forms through which He may be approached.
Laughter is God's blessing.
Nothing that is God's is obtainable by money.
God is not a cosmic bellboy for whom we can press a button to get things.
At the cross God wrapped his heart in flesh and blood and let it be nailed to the cross for our redemption.
Since His delights are to be with you, let yours be found in Him.
Your God is ever beside you - indeed, He is even within you.
